summary: This adds a follower called Elborn to the game.
descriptionHtml:
Currently you will need to spwan Elborn in, you can do this by typing 'player.placeatme 34000D62' into the console. Eventualy he will be in the pub I am going to make.

There will be 2 versions to this, in the current version there is only a hireable follower, eventualy you will be able to find him in a cave. He is an argonian male hirable follower.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

What am I working on?

Currently I am working on a tavern/pub that will eventualy be used by many people including Elborn.

What am I going to be working on next?

I will be working on the cave you can find him in and also there will be other optional files for a vendor in the tevern and a few NPCs.
author: MVORY
